text: Silver into Gold is a 1987 American short documentary film produced by Lynn Mueller. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. The film looks at American athletes Gail Roper and Marion Irvine. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1987 films Category:1987 short films Category:1987 documentary films Category:American films Category:American independent films Category:American documentary films Category:English- language films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about sportspeople
title: Silver into Gold
